attributes.action: Disclose the location of safety (speed) cameras.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These cameras are allegedly to reduce accidents at blackspots throughout the UK and we want the goverment to disclose the location of all fixed and mobile safety camera locations in a format that can be downloaded and used with GPS and Sat Nav devices to warn the motorist that they are approaching a safety camera.

By doing this, the government and local police can reinforce the principal that safety cameras are not about taxing the motorist but are to prevent accidents.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
